description.value: Can take one minute charge various machines/devices, making a Toughness Test dependant on the scale. +10: Power Cell, Illuminator. +0, Weapon Charge Pack, Data Slate, Bridge Terminal. -10: Hotshot charge pack, shuttle electronics, servo skull. -20: Lascannon Charge Pack, Servitor, Bridge Hololith. -30: Ship Cogitator Core, Reactor Machine Spirit, Xenos Technology. GM judges viability, afterwards must pass Toughness or gain a level of fatigue.
